title: What Good books about minecraft would you recommend? - Quora

response.answer_text: a book. well. if you want one that is plainly english, go search it on amazon! there is lots. some of my favorites are "The minecraft book" and "Minecraft Guide series" and also, there is one about the adventure of steve, which is written by winter Morgan, about a player who was once a griever until he got whipped inside of the minecraft world....
